es.hero_text: La oportunidad para desentra√±ar tus emociones y convertirlas en un s√≠mbolo poderoso para tu crecimiento. Descubre c√≥mo afrontar lo que te duele puede cambiar tu vida en un espacio seguro y creativo.
es.video_play: Mira c√≥mo funciona Catarsis Lab ~1 min
es.step_01_text: Estar√°s constantemente apoyado, envuelto en una atm√≥sfera de calidez, cuidado y contenci√≥n que te permitir√° sentir y sanar.

es.team_subtitle: Conoce a las exploradoras de verdades internas detr√°s de Catarsis Lab.

es.team_alex_detail_1: Exploradora de verdades internas y de experiencias humanas.
es.team_alex_detail_3: Apasionada de las cuestiones de la vida.
es.exp_talleres_text_1: Nuestros talleres no son solo encuentros, son celebraciones de tu potencial. En Catarsis Lab, creamos experiencias terap√©uticas en espacios seguros y acogedores donde puedes explorar tus emociones y convertir tus vivencias en un reflejo de tu crecimiento personal.
es.exp_talleres_text_2: A trav√©s de diferentes din√°micas y tem√°ticas, Joan y Ale te guiar√°n en viajes √∫nicos dise√±ados para ayudarte a soltar lo que ya no te sirve y dar la bienvenida a lo nuevo‚Äîaquello que necesita nacer en ti o tomar forma por primera vez.
es.exp_talleres_italic: Descubre c√≥mo cada historia que has vivido importa y cada detalle cuenta en este camino hacia el renacer emocional.
es.exp_spots_text: En Catarsis Lab, abrimos nuestros Spots Terap√©uticos: espacios exclusivos para quienes buscan acompa√±amiento psicol√≥gico y una intervenci√≥n precisa, con el m√≠nimo n√∫mero de encuentros necesarios, pero el m√°ximo impacto posible.
es.exp_spots_item_2: Cuando alguien finaliza su proceso, abrimos un espacio para la siguiente persona en lista de espera.
es.exp_spots_item_3: Los espacios est√°n disponibles desde hoy. La oportunidad est√° abierta: si sientes que es tu momento, reserva tu spot ahora.
es.exp_spots_footer: No hace falta esperar a tocar fondo para pedir ayuda. Si lo necesitas, aqu√≠ estamos. üíõ
es.faq_subtitle: Todo lo que necesitas saber sobre nuestro laboratorio de gesti√≥n emocional.
es.faq_q1: ¬øQu√© es exactamente un laboratorio de gesti√≥n emocional?
es.faq_a1: Es un espacio terap√©utico y creativo donde, a trav√©s de la psicolog√≠a y el co-dise√±o de experiencias, trabajamos para transformar emociones y vivencias en s√≠mbolos poderosos de crecimiento personal.
es.faq_q2: ¬øNecesito experiencia previa en arte o psicolog√≠a?
es.faq_a2: No, ninguna. Solo necesitas la disposici√≥n para hacerte preguntas y explorar tus historias de vida. Nosotros te guiaremos en el proceso de co-creaci√≥n utilizando herramientas accesibles para todos.
es.faq_a3: Son encuentros seguros (individuales o grupales) donde exploramos un interrogante actual de tu existencia y dise√±amos juntos un escenario o ritual creativo que te permita transitar y resignificar esa emoci√≥n.
es.faq_a4: Significa darle un nuevo sentido a viejas vivencias o guiones internos que te limitan. Dejas de ser la v√≠ctima de tu pasado para convertirte en el narrador principal de tu vida presente y futura.
es.faq_a5: Ofrecemos ambas modalidades. Nuestro laboratorio virtual permite que personas de cualquier lugar del mundo se unan a nuestras experiencias y grupos de apoyo.
es.contact_subtitle: D√©janos un mensaje y te responderemos lo antes posible.

en.hero_text: The opportunity to unravel your emotions and turn them into a powerful symbol for your growth. Discover how facing what hurts you can change your life in a safe and creative space.
en.video_play: Watch how Catarsis Lab works ~1 min
en.step_01_text: You will be constantly supported, wrapped in an atmosphere of warmth, care, and containment that will allow you to feel and heal.
en.step_02_text: We combine psychology and design so that you are the narrator of your own change, transforming your questions into creative symbols.
en.step_03_text: You will take a small piece of your story, see it clearly, and give it a new meaning... to keep moving forward.
en.step_04_text: Heal and manage your life history to build a life aligned with your inner potential and new vital tools.
en.features_subtitle: We build meaning, vitality, and inspiration through the union of creative and psychotherapeutic components.
en.feature_sentir_text: Allow yourself to transit your emotions within a safe space designed for internal exploration.
en.feature_sublimar_text: Transform the internal scripts that limit your individual development into growth experiences.
en.feature_resignificar_text: Give a new meaning to old experiences, becoming the main narrator of your life.
en.feature_integrar_text: Heal and manage your life history to build a life aligned with your inner potential.
en.team_subtitle: Meet the explorers of internal truths behind Catarsis Lab.
en.team_joan_detail_1: Explorer of internal truths and human experiences.
en.team_alex_detail_1: Explorer of internal truths and human experiences.
en.exp_talleres_text_1: Our workshops are not just meetings, they are celebrations of your potential. At Catarsis Lab, we create therapeutic experiences in safe and welcoming spaces where you can explore your emotions and turn your experiences into a reflection of your personal growth.
en.exp_talleres_text_2: Through different dynamics and themes, Joan and Ale will guide you on unique journeys designed to help you let go of what no longer serves you and welcome the new‚Äîthat which needs to be born in you or take shape for the first time.
en.exp_talleres_italic: Discover how every story you've lived matters and every detail counts on this path toward emotional rebirth.
en.exp_spots_text: At Catarsis Lab, we open our Therapeutic Spots: exclusive spaces for those seeking psychological support and precise intervention, with the minimum number of meetings necessary, but the maximum possible impact.
en.exp_spots_item_2: When someone finishes their process, we open a spot for the next person on the waiting list.
en.exp_spots_item_3: Spots are available starting today. The opportunity is open: if you feel it's your time, reserve your spot now.
en.exp_spots_footer: No need to wait to hit rock bottom to ask for help. If you need it, we are here. üíõ
en.faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about our emotional management lab.
en.faq_q1: What exactly is an emotional management lab?
en.faq_a1: It is a therapeutic and creative space where, through psychology and experience co-design, we work to transform emotions and experiences into powerful symbols of personal growth.
en.faq_q2: Do I need previous experience in art or psychology?
en.faq_a2: No, none. You only need the willingness to ask yourself questions and explore your life stories. We will guide you through the co-creation process using tools accessible to everyone.
en.faq_a3: They are safe encounters (individual or group) where we explore a current question of your existence and together design a creative scenario or ritual that allows you to transit and resignify Í∑∏ emotion.
en.faq_a4: It means giving a new meaning to old experiences or internal scripts that limit you. You stop being the victim of your past to become the main narrator of your present and future life.
en.faq_q5: Do you offer in-person or virtual care?
en.faq_a5: We offer both modalities. Our virtual lab allows people from anywhere in the world to join our experiences and support groups.
en.contact_subtitle: Leave us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
en.contact_placeholder_message: Your story inspires us. If you have comments or any questions, don't hesitate to write to us. We're here to listen.
en.footer_newsletter_text: Receive a new resignified story every Sunday.
